name: mcp-skills-plugins
description: Claude Code plugins generated from MCP servers using mcp2rest. Each plugin provides agents and skills for interacting with MCP tools.

plugins.name: chrome-devtools-plugin
plugins.description: Browser automation and DevTools control. Navigate pages, interact with elements, inspect network/console, analyze performance, and capture screenshots for web testing and automation tasks.

plugins.name: figma-desktop-plugin
plugins.description: Extract UI code, design tokens, and screenshots from Figma designs via desktop app. Use when implementing designs, building component libraries, or documenting design systems.
